system.description:
Your psionic development offers further permanent enhancements to your already mentally empowered physical abilities, granting the following benefits:

  • When using your Flurry of Blows, you may expend a psi die and roll it in order to make use your Mind Strike as part of the same bonus action.
  • When you use Long Step, you may roll a psi die and increase the bonus movement speed by an amount equal to 5 x the result of the roll.  Similar to the bonus from Mind over Matter, this is added after all other modifications to movement speed and multiplied by dashing, the haste spell, or other similar effects.
  • When you would take damage while under the effect of Patient Defence, you use your reaction and roll a psi die and reduce the damage by an amount equal to the roll + your Intelligence Modifier.
  • In the case of all the above abilities, on a roll of 1 or 2 on the psi die the die is expended. On a roll of the maximum value on the die you instead regain one, if any, lost die.
